attributes.action: Stowaways of illegals emergents on uk trucks from French ports
attributes.additional_details: Stop Fines imposed on drivers when stowaways of illegal immigrants are found on their vehicle. Heavy fines are unfairly imposed on goods vehicle drivers and there employers. The UK border force should take more action against stowaways and French authority's need to police and enforce the law for damage and intimidation of goods vehicle drivers when using ferry crossings and the euro tunnel .
